docs.title: Welcome to Databricks Enablement AutoPublish
docs.text: This project showcases a modern approach to enablement delivery—leveraging Markdown, GitHub, CI/CD, and automation to build scalable, field-ready technical training content.

docs.title: 👩‍💻 Built by Fran Ma
docs.text: This content is designed to: - Support technical field teams - Demonstrate domain mastery in Data & AI - Create proofs-of-concept for pre-sales enablement - Explore open tools like Delta Sharing and Lakehouse

docs.title: Delta Sharing Quickstart (Field Enablement Guide)
docs.text: This guide supports technical field teams—particularly those in pre-sales, customer success, and solutions architecture roles—by offering a hands-on framework for understanding and creating technical proofs-of-concept (POC) using Delta Sharing.

docs.title: 🧠 Learning Objectives
docs.text:
By the end of this guide, you will be able to:

  • Explain what Delta Sharing is and why it matters
  • Describe use cases for cross-org data collaboration
  • Launch a Delta Sharing workspace
  • Share a Delta Table with an external recipient
  • Create and present a pre-sales POC scenario

docs.title: 🎯 Field POC Use Case Example
docs.text:
You're working with a customer in the financial services industry that needs to: - Share anonymized transaction data with a partner - Avoid duplicating data pipelines or compromising compliance

In this guide, you'll simulate that exact use case by: - Creating a secure share - Adding a recipient - Querying data from the recipient side - Demonstrating it in a way that supports a pre-sales conversation

docs.title: ✅ Hands-on Practice (in Databricks Community Edition)
docs.text:
1. Go to the Data tab → Create a Delta Table
  2. Go to the Sharing tab → Create a new Share
  3. Add a recipient
  4. Test query on the shared table
